info.description:
# Api for Trader Make Money service

Api supports 2 authentication method:

- JWT token (use `POST /auth/login` to obtain token)

- ApiKey (generated by user using `PUT /api-user`)

_If provided both JWT will be first and if JWT token not valid your will get `401 Unauthorized Error`_

#### How to use generated api key

You can use generated api key as header `API-KEY: your_api_key`

Curl example:

```bash
curl https://tradermake.money/api/v2/trades \
   -H "API-KEY: *api key*" \
   -H "Content-Type: application/json"
```

#### How to use JWT token

You can use JWT token as header `Authorization: Bearer *your api key*`

Curl example:

```bash
curl https://tradermake.money/api/v2/trades \
   -H "Authorization: Bearer *JWT token*" \
   -H "Content-Type: application/json"
```

You will get new token in each response in headers. You can use it for next requests.
You don't need to refresh token manually - it will be refreshed automatically on each request.

## Access points

Main: _https://tradermake.money/api/v2_

Mirror: _https://tradermakemoney.com/api/v2_

## Rate limits

All endpoints send `x-rate-limit` headers. Please respect it or you will get error: `429 too many requests`.

- `x-ratelimit-limit` - maximum requests count for this endpoint for period of time

- `x-ratelimit-remaining` - Requests left

- `x-ratelimit-reset` - Timestamp (sec) when limit will reset to `x-ratelimit-limit`

**Rates are different for different endpoints**. Violating of rules constantly will lead to account block and/or IP ban.

## Changelog

- 25/04/2024

  - `TradeSummary` added new field:
    - `MinLeverage`
    - `MaxLeverage`
    - `AvgCommission`

- 07/04/2024

  - `GET SSE` returns stream
  - `POST /sse/connect` and `POST /sse/disconnect` deprecated

- 09/02/2023

  - Added `POST /trades/{id}/chart-data` endpoint
  - Added `POST /analyzer/{ticker}/chart-data` endpoint
  - `/loadCandlesData` endpoints deprecated. Use `/chart-data` instead

- 08/12/2022
  - Added `GET /board/public/{code}/load` endpoint
  - Added `POST /board/{id}/short-url` endpoint

get.description:
Use the Stream for Server-Sent Events (SSE) to receive messages from the server.

Authorization must be provided through the Authorization header with a Bearer token or the API-KEY Header. Use a polyfill to modify the standard browser implementation if necessary.

## Events:

| Event ID             | Return Object      | Description                                                                         | Action Required                                  |
| -------------------- | ------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| `trade`              | Trade              | Triggered only when a new trade is opened.                                          | None                                             |
| `trades`             | Empty              | Signals to update the trades list. Common after an API key connection.              | Update trades list                               |
| `profile`            | Empty              | Indicates a need to update user data.                                               | Update user data using `/auth/me`                |
| `transaction`        | Empty              | Signals that the list of transactions and their payment statuses should be updated. | Update list of transactions and payment statuses |
| `risk-management`    | RiskManagementLog  | Sent if a new risk management violation occurs.                                     | None                                             |
| `trade-update`       | Trade              | Sent after trade data is updated, including new executions on the exchange.         | None                                             |
| `notification`       | NotificationPublic | Indicates a new notification.                                                       | None                                             |
| `apikey`             | ApiKey             | Sent when the API key's status changes, e.g., from disconnected to connected.       | None                                             |
| `telegram-connected` | TelegramConnect    | Indicates a successful connection to Telegram.                                      | None                                             |
| `discord-connected`  | DiscordConnect     | Indicates a successful connection to Discord.                                       | None                                             |

post.description: Create new SSE stream on server and get stream ID (string). After that you can use this stream ID to receive messages from server.
Remove SSE stream from server. For security always disconnect after use.

websocket_status.description:
Websocket status
0 - disconnected
1 - connected
2 - connecting
3 - error

new_trade_notification.description:
Notification mode
0 - disabled
1 - all
2 - open only
3 - execution only

show_trades.description:
Show Trades:
0 - Disabled
1 - All
2 - Only Closed
3 - Only Opened

new_trade_notification.description:
Notification mode
0 - disabled
1 - all
2 - open only
3 - execution only

preview.description:
Preview mode (always disabled in private mode)
0 - disabled
1 - enabled for any notification
2 - enabled for close notification only

tags.description:
# Authorization

To communicate with api JWT token or Api-key required.

After sign-up, the user must confirm the account by clicking on the link sent to his email, otherwise all endpoints, except for `auth`, will return an error `429 Unauthorized`.
tags.name: auth
